rs.The rosé-colour dial, crafted to perfect: Savršeno izra?eni ružicasti brojcanik nastao je u okviru Rolex manufakture u Švajcarskoj i sadrži deset dijamantskih satnih markera, postavljenih na suptilno brušenoj površini
rs.With its fourteen patented engineering s: Zahvaljujuci nizu od cetrnaest patentiranih inženjerskih rešenja, kalibar 3255 predvodi sve brojniju ponudu Rolex mehanizama nove generacije, cineci kolekciju Day-Date prvom linijom casovnika koja se može pohvaliti temeljnim prednostima u pogledu preciznosti, rezerve snage, otpornosti prema uticajima potresa i izlaganja magnetnim poljima, lakoce upotrebe i pouzdanosti.
rs.A testament to Rolex watchmaking know-ho: Kao svedocanstvo casovnicarske izvrsnosti i pažnje koja je posvecena detaljima, kalibar 3255 sadrži prikaz datuma koji se krajem dana menja  trenutno, za razliku od produžene promene koja neretko može dovesti do pogrešnog ocitavanja.
rs.It is only seeing it in reality that 18c: Zahvaljujuci jedinstvenoj nijansi Everose osamnaestokaratnog zlata, lepota casovnika dolazi do izražaja na jedinstven nacin
rs.Like every Rolex timepiece, the Day-Date: Poput svih Rolex meraca vremena, referenca Day-Date 36 sertifikovana je u skladu sa Superlative Chronometer standardima – predstavljajuci casovnik koji je prošao nezavisna ispitivanja COSC performansi u okviru Švajcarskog instituta za ispitivanje hronometra, kao i dvostruko zahtevnije ispitivanje tacnosti u okviru ateljea Rolex, uz postupke kontrole kvaliteta koji ukljucuju rezervu snage, efikasnost samonavijanja i otpornost na uticaje vode.
rs.A watchmaking icon that blends form and: Kolekciju Day-Date modela, legende casovnicarstva koja spaja formu, funkciju i nenadmašni prestiž, sa zadovoljstvom cemo predstaviti u okviru Petite Geneve Petrovic Rolex butika, na lokacijama u Budimpešti, Beogradu i Porto Montenegru.
rs.The Rolex Oyster Perpetual Sky-Dweller e: Rolex Oyster Perpetual Sky-Dweller, namenjen savremenim kosmopolitama, elegantno kombinuje prakticnost i jedinstvenu strucnost u izradi casovnika.

Rolex Oyster Perpetual Sky-Dweller, namenjen savremenim kosmopolitama, elegantno kombinuje prakticnost i jedinstvenu strucnost u izradi casovnika. Dizajniran da istovremeno prati i adekvatno prikazuje dve vremenske zone, zadivljujuce složeni Sky-Dweller tako?e promoviše godišnji Saros kalendar sa Ring Command sistemom.
rs.Two separate time zones are displayed si: Dve vremenske zone prikazuju se istovremeno na krajnje elegantnom Sky-Dweller brojcaniku. Legendarni Cyclops prikaz datuma nalazi se na poziciji za 3 casa, dok sklad dominantnih satnih oznaka i prepoznatljivog oblika kazaljki pruža beskompromisnu citljivost
rs.Beautifully disguising its underlying co: Velicanstveno prikrivajuci svoju kompleksnost, Sky-Dweller zadržava odlucan fokus na citljivosti - atributu od osnovne važnosti. Jasan raspored elemenata brojcanika, sa izuzetno preglednim indeksima i kazaljkama, obezbe?uje optimalno i precizno ocitavanje lokalnog vremena. Zahvaljujuci dugotrajnom Chromalight sjaju plave boje, ocitavanje vremena je jasno vidljivo kako danju tako u uslovima slabijeg osvetljenja. Lokalno vreme prikazano je centralnim kazaljkama Sky-Dweller casovnika. Tokom putovanja, ovaj tradicionalni prikaz omogucava precizno ocitavanje lokalnog vremena, olakšavajuci pracenje sastanaka i reda letenja na trenutnoj lokaciji. Nasuprot tome, prsten koji je postavljen izvan središta prikazuje trenutno vreme kod kuce.
rs.By contrast, the off-centre ring provide: Rec je o korisnoj funkciji koju omogucava 24-casovni prsten, ilustrujuci prepodnevno ili poslepodnevno vreme, u slucajevima kada ste od porodice ili sedišta poslovanja udaljeni nekoliko vremenskih zona.
rs.Uniquely smart from cover to cover: the: Nenadmašno napredan, do najsitnijeg detalja: Sky-Dweller pokrece jedan od tehnicki najsloženijih mehanizama ikada osmišljenih u okviru kompanije Rolex
rs.When not travelling, the displays can be: U danima bez putovanja, prikaz se može prilagoditi, koristeci glavne kazaljke za odre?ivanje vremena kod kuce, istovremeno oslanjajuci se na 24-casovni disk za lako pracenje vremenske zone poslovnih partnera ili porodice u inostranstvu.
rs.Behind the Sky-Dweller’s date and month: Prikaz datuma i meseca na modelu Sky-Dweller podržava impresivan Saros godišnji kalendar. Datum je naznacen u prepoznatljivom Cyclops polju i nalazi se na položaju za 3 casa na brojcaniku. Prikaz datuma je izuzetne tehnicke preciznosti, buduci da se datum menja tacno u ponoc, bez mogucnosti pogrešnog ocitavanja datuma tokom sati oko ponoci.
rs.The refined textures and adaptable shape: Rafinirane teksture i prilagodljivi oblici koji karakterišu Sky-Dweller u savršenoj su harmoniji, stvarajuci neprolaznu eleganciju
rs.The second display of the Saros annual c: Drugi prikaz Saros godišnjeg kalendara odnosi se na mesec u godini, koji je naznacen na rubu brojcanika. Na spoljnoj ivici svakog Everose zlatnog indeksa nalazi se pravougaonik, koji koristi crvenu boju za oznacavanje trenutnog meseca u godini, dok broj meseca odgovara indeksu sata.
rs.The month aperture at 12 o’clock marks D: Pravougaonik kod indeksa za 12 casova oznacava decembar, kod indeksa 1 oznacava januar, stvarajuci logican niz.
rs.The Saros annual calendar has yet anothe: Godišnji Saros kalendar nudi i dodatnu pogodnost: zahvaljujuci u potpunosti mehanickom mehanizmu, sistem pravi razliku izme?u meseci koji imaju 30 i 31 dan, što omogucava da prikaz datuma preskace 31. dan u mesecima koji se završavaju brojem 30 - automatski u ponoc oznacavajuci pocetak narednog meseca. Istovremeno, prikaz datuma na modelu Sky-Dweller zahteva svega jedno podešavanje tokom godine, koje je rezervisano za 1. mart.
rs.The Sky-Dweller is equipped with the Rin: Sky-Dweller je tako?e opremljen Ring Command sistemom, revolucionarnim mehanizmom interakcije izme?u rotirajuceg prstena, navijajuce krunice i mehanizma. Podešavanje casovnika prilikom prebacivanja vremenskih zona izuzetno je jednostavno i intuitivno. Nakon odvrtanja Twinlock krunice, nazubljeni prsten – besprekorno izveden od cvrstog Everose zlata - može se rotirati u smeru suprotnom od kretanja kazaljke na satu, kako biste odabrali funkciju casovnika koju želite da podesite. Tada se izabrana funkcija brzo, jednostavno i sigurno podešava putem krunice. Prepoznatljiv klik i glatko okretanje Ring Command prstena predstavljaju neuporedivo taktilno iskustvo u svetu casovnicarstva, marljivo dizajnirano za jedinstveni osecaj, funkcionalnost i trajnost. Zašticen Oyster kucištem, vodootpornim do 100 m dubine, Rolex kalibar 9001 prezentuje besprekornu demonstraciju Rolex tehnologije.
rs.Protected by the 100m waterproof Oyster: Zahvaljujuci nizu patenata koji su registrovani tokom razvoja, u pitanju je jedan od najsloženijih mehanizama koje je kompanija Rolex ikada osmislila.
rs.The fully mechanical Saros annual calend: Godišnji Saros kalendar Sky-Dweller casovnika razlikuje mesece sa 30 ili 31 danom, omogucavajuci da prikaz datuma preskoci 31. dan ukoliko mesec ima 30 dana, cime automatski u ponoc prikazuje pocetak narednog meseca. Tako?e, prikaz datuma na modelima Sky-Dweller kolekcije zahteva svega jedno podešavanje tokom godine, rezervisano za 1. mart
rs.Its architecture, manufacturing and inno: Jedinstvena arhitektura, proizvodni standardi i inovativne funkcije cine ga izuzetno preciznim i pouzdanim. Nudeci produženu rezervu snage od 72 casa, kompletiranu dvosmernim samonavijajucim Perpetual rotorom, kalibar 9001 dizajniran je za svetske putnike.
rs.The Sky-Dweller is equipped with the Rin: Sky-Dweller je opremljen Ring Command sistemom revolucionarnog mehanizma komunikacije rotirajuceg bezela, krunice i mehanizma. Intuitivni izum omogucava jednostavno podešavanje vremena i datuma prilikom promene vremenskih zona
rs.Presented in Everose gold, an exclusive: Predstavljen u ekskluzivnom osamnaestokaratnom Everose ružicastom zlatu, koju je kreirao i patentirao Rolex, Sky-Dweller svoju jedinstvenu nijansu i poseban sjaj duguje specijalnom sastavu ove legure. Atelje Rolex upravlja vlastitom livnicom i legira svoje zlato koristeci najcistije sirovine. Ova izvanredna posvecenost kvalitetu se ogleda u svakom detalju Everose zlata casovnika Sky-Dweller. Oyster narukvica je tako?e izra?ena u Everose zlatu i ukljucuje Oysterclasp kopcu i Easylink sistem komfornog produžetka narukvice od 5 mm, koji pruža vrhunsku udobnost nošenja u svim okolnostima.
rs.Enveloped in the beautiful radiance of E: Izveden u ocaravajucoj nijansi Everose zlata, Sky-Dweller istice izvanredna dostignuca kompanije Rolex u domenu proizvodnje i prerade metala
rs.Like every Rolex timepiece presently man: Poput svih aktuelnih Rolex meraca vremena, Sky-Dweller modeli sertifikovani su u skladu sa Superlative Chronometer standardima – predstavljajuci casovnike koji su sa uspehom savladali nezavisna COSC ispitivanja u okviru Švajcarskog instituta za ispitivanje hronometra, kao i dvostruko zahtevnije provere kompanije Rolex - interna ispitivanja tacnosti i kontrole kvaliteta koja ukljucuju proveru rezerve snage, efikasnosti samonavijanja i otpornosti na uticaje vode.
rs.We would be delighted to show you the Sk: Kolekciju Sky-Dweller casovnika sa zadovoljstvom cemo predstaviti u okviru Petite Genève Petrovic Rolex butika, na lokacijama u Budimpešti, Beogradu i Porto Montenegro.

hu.Christie’s Achieves World Record Price f: Christie’s Achieves World Record Price for Any Rolex Sold at Auction
hu.Rolex broke through the magic $1 million: Rolex broke through the magic $1 million mark at Christie's Geneva auction held at the Four Seasons Hotel des Bergues where an oversized stainless steel split seconds chronograph wristwatch manufactured in 1942 sold for $1,163,340 including the buyer's pr

Rolex broke through the magic $1 million mark at Christie's Geneva auction held at the Four Seasons Hotel des Bergues where an oversized stainless steel split seconds chronograph wristwatch manufactured in 1942 sold for $1,163,340 including the buyer's premium. This is the all-time high price paid for any Rolex at auction.
hu.The record-setter is a reference 4113 si: The record-setter is a reference 4113 signed Rolex, Chronographe, Antimagnetique, manufactured in 1942. The movement is a Valjoux caliber 55 VBR, a 17 2/3\"' nickel-finished lever movement with 17 jewels. The dial is silvered matte with applied pink gold Arabic and baton numerals, outer minute divisions, blue telemeter and black tachymeter scales, and two subsidiary dials for constant seconds and 30 minutes register. The round case measures a highly unusual 44mm. The case has fluted lugs and a snap-on back. The split seconds chronograph mechanism is operated through two rectangular chronograph buttons in the case band and one round chronograph button in the crown. The case, dial and movement are signed.
hu.Overall the sale brought more than $26.3: Overall the sale brought more than $26.3 million, up 25% compared with last year's Geneva sale. The top watch of the night is a unique 18k white gold cushion-shaped single button chronograph wristwatch manufactured in 1928 by Patek Philippe which sold for more than $3.6 million against a pre-sale high estimate of $2.8 million. This piece set a new world auction record for any simple chronograph watch.
hu.This year's Oyster Perpetual Datejust Sp: This year's Oyster Perpetual Datejust Special Edition is more sensual and dazzling than ever.
hu.A bold incarnation of a feminine classic: A bold incarnation of a feminine classic, its 34 mm 18 ct EVEROSE gold case, bracelet and bezel exerts an intoxicating power, and the bezel sparkles with 12 brilliant-cut diamonds, elegantly showcased in 18 ct white gold settings.
hu.The effect is luminous, exquisite and en: The effect is luminous, exquisite and enchanting. The mother-of-pearl dial is embellished with pink gold dust applied in a fine layer via a patented PVD process that preserves the mother-of-pearl's natural structure while imbuing it with a metallic sheen.
hu.\nThe new Datejust Special Edition stand: The new Datejust Special Edition stands out thanks to its sensuous lines, feminine form and new invisible clasp. It also boasts typical Rolex precision and reliability, being as always superbly water-resistant and featuring a COSC-certified self-winding mechanical movement.
hu.Rolex uses 904L steel for its steel watc: Rolex uses 904L steel for its steel watch cases. 904L is usually reserved for the chemical industry, where maximum resistance against corrosion is essential.
hu.904L marries perfectly with the other pr: 904L marries perfectly with the other precious metals used by Rolex. A super alloy, 904L is extremly resistan and highly polishable.
hu.Rolex Sponsors 24 Hours of Le Mans: Rolex Sponsors 24 Hours of Le Mans
hu.Organized by the Societe Sportive Profes: Organized by the Societe Sportive Professionelle de l'Automobile Club de l'Ouest (SSP-ACO), the 79th edition of 24 Hours of Le Mans will be held on June 11-12 this year.
hu.\nLargely recognized as the most prestig: Largely recognized as the most prestigious endurance automobile race in the world, 24 Hours of Le Mans was created in 1923 and is a powerful draw for both celebrities and professional drivers. Actor cum motor sports aficionado Paul Newman entered the Le Mans and placed second in 1979 – a widely publicized event of the time.
hu.\nAs the official timekeeper for the eve: As the official timekeeper for the event, Rolex will honor the champions with the sporty yet elegant Oyster Perpetual Cosmograph Daytona timepiece. Rolex has been Official Timekeeper for 24 Hours of Le Mans since 2001 and Title Sponsor of the Rolex 24 at Daytona in North America since 1992.
hu.Tiger Woods and Rolex: A Partnership For: Tiger Woods and Rolex: A Partnership For A New Challenge
hu.Rolex watches have made golfing history: Rolex watches have made golfing history on the wrists of the most legendary players. In keeping with its passion for excellence and its long-standing commitment to the world of golf, Rolex is proud to announce its partnership with famous American golfer,

Rolex watches have made golfing history on the wrists of the most legendary players. In keeping with its passion for excellence and its long-standing commitment to the world of golf, Rolex is proud to announce its partnership with famous American golfer, Tiger Woods who is among the most successful golfers of all time.
hu.Tiger is arguably the greatest Golf play: Tiger is arguably the greatest Golf player in history, having won 14 majors and 82 worldwide wins. Rolex is convinced that Tiger Woods still has a long career ahead of him and that he has all the qualities required to continue to mark the history of golf. Also, Rolex said it was paying tribute \"to the exceptional stature of Tiger Woods and the leading role he plays in forging sport's global appeal\".
hu.Woods turned professional in 1996, and b: Woods turned professional in 1996, and by April 1997 he had already won his first major, the 1997 Masters in a record-breaking performance. He first reached the number one position in the world rankings in June 1997. Through the 2000s, Woods was the dominant force in golf, spending 264 weeks from August 1999 to September 2004 and 281 weeks from June 2005 to October 2010 as world number one.
hu.In between tennis tournaments, six times: In between tennis tournaments, six times winner of Wimbledon and tennis phenomenon, Roger Federer gains an exclusive preview of the new Oyster Perpetual Sky-Dweller.
hu.\nFamous player from Switzerland is also: Famous player from Switzerland is also one of the Rolex ambassadors and a great connoisseur of the brand. We invite you to watch the video.
hu.Rolex, the leading luxury watchmaking br: Rolex, the leading luxury watchmaking brand and a pioneer of sports sponsorship, will become a major long-term partner of Formula 1 from 2013 as the Official Timekeeper and Official Timepiece.
hu.This reinforces Rolex's commitment to mo: This reinforces Rolex's commitment to motor racing and its support of global sport at the very highest level. This new partnership with the pinnacle of motor sports brings together two leaders in their fields who share a passion for performance, precision, excellence and innovation. It is part of a strategic move by Rolex to focus its sponsorship activities on ventures chosen for their strong symbolic value and their global resonance.
hu.\nLike Rolex, Formula1® is present the w: Like Rolex, Formula1® is present the world over, with 19 races organized in 19 countries across five continents… In each of these two worlds, high technology and performance combine with the highest level of know-how to constantly challenge the limits of the possible.
hu.A legendary model that has enjoyed unequ: A legendary model that has enjoyed unequalled recognition since its launch in 1963, the Oyster Perpetual COSMOGRAPH DAYTONA presented at Baselworld 2012 offers yet more of the enchantment for which it is renowned.
hu.Along with its 18 ct yellow gold case an: Along with its 18 ct yellow gold case and bracelet, this COSMOGRAPH DAYTONA dons a bezel entirely set with an array of sapphires in rainbow colours. All the nuances of the celestial arc are visible, a delicate palette of reds, oranges, yellows, greens, blues, mauves and pinks. The subtle grace of these fascinating stones meticulously selected, assembled and set by Rolex is magical, endowing the watch with a stunning radiance. Also gem-set, the case lugs, crown guard as well as the hour markers on the dial participate in the exquisite allure of this variation on the DAYTONA theme.
hu.Exclusive GOLD CRYSTALS counters – Contr: Exclusive GOLD CRYSTALS counters – Contrasting with the black lacquer of the dial, the reflections of the gold cry­stals counters blend with the radiance of the precious stones. Crafted from an 18 ct gold alloy perfected by Rolex in its own foundry, these exclusive counters highlight the crystal structure of the gold in a seductive play of reflections and colours. Each counter is a natural work of art, different from every other.
hu.The OYSTER case, symbol of waterproofnes: The OYSTER case, symbol of waterproofness – The COSMO­GRAPH DAYTONA’s 40 mm OYSTER case, guaranteed waterproof to a depth of 100 metres (330 feet), is a paragon of proportion and elegance. The characteristically shaped middle case is crafted from a solid block of 18 ct gold. The fluted case back is hermetically screwed down with a special tool exclusive to Rolex watchmakers. The winding crown, fitted with the patented TRIPLOCK triple waterproofness system, as well as the chronograph pushers screw down securely against the case. It is protected by a crown guard that is an integral part of the middle case. The crystal is made of virtually scratchproof synthetic sapphire. The waterproof OYSTER case ensures optimal protection for the COSMOGRAPH DAYTONA’s high-precision movement.
hu.Calibre 4130, a superlative chronograph: Calibre 4130, a superlative chronograph chronometer – The COSMOGRAPH DAYTONA is equipped with calibre 4130, a self-winding mechanical chronograph movement entirely developed and manufactured by Rolex. Like all PERPETUAL movements, the 4130 is a certified Swiss chronometer, a designation reserved for high-precision watches that have successfully passed the Swiss Official Chronometer Testing Institute (COSC) tests. Its architecture, like that of all OYSTER watch movements, makes it singularly precise and reliable. The oscillator, the true heart of the watch, has a blue PARACHROM hairspring, patented and manufactured by Rolex in an exclusive alloy. Insensitive to magnetic fields, the PARACHROM hairspring offers great stability when exposed to temperature variations and remains up to 10 times more precise than a traditional hairspring in case of shocks.
hu.The OYSTERLOCK clasp, functional and sec: The OYSTERLOCK clasp, functional and secure – This Cosmograph Daytona is fitted with an Oyster bracelet in 18 ct yellow gold with the latest generation Oysterlock safety clasp to prevent accidental opening. Developed and patented by Rolex, this elegant solid-link bracelet also features the ingenious EASYLINK rapid extension system that allows the wearer to easily increase the bracelet length by approximately 5 mm, for additional comfort in any circumstance. n
hu.In the presence of influential guests Ro: In the presence of influential guests Rolex inaugurated the new building at its watch movement production facility in Bienne. After the traditional ribbon cutting, guests and journalists toured the brand's new movement production workshops where the high-

In the presence of influential guests Rolex inaugurated the new building at its watch movement production facility in Bienne. After the traditional ribbon cutting, guests and journalists toured the brand's new movement production workshops where the high-value added manual watchmaking know-how is combined with the highly advanced technology.
hu.\nThe new building, product of one of th: The new building, product of one of the largest industrial construction projects in recent years in Switzerland, enables the world's leading luxury watchmaker to rationalize production of its watch movements. Movement manufacturing has been brought together on a single ultra-modern 400,000 m3 site – of which the new building occupies 230,000 m3 – over a total area of 92,000 m2. The new building in Bienne marks the culmination of the strategy Rolex adopted over 10 years ago with the aim of integrating production of all the essential components for its watches – from the case to the movement, from the dial to the bracelet – on four purpose-built or remodelled sites, three in Geneva and one in Bienne.
hu.\nThe building's architecture is sleek a: The building's architecture is sleek and rigorous. It provides vast space and good natural daylight thanks to light wells whose design was inspired by the watch movement. The new building was designed and built to strict standards concerning safety, integration into the environment and respect for the natural surroundings, as well as with sustainable development in mind.
hu.A majestic evolution of one of the great: A majestic evolution of one of the greatest classics of contemporary watchmaking, the Oyster Perpetual DATEJUST II is presented at Baselworld 2012 in a version entirely in steel with a smooth bezel. This new, imposing and dynamic model joins the ROLESOR version – in steel and gold – launched in 2009.
hu.The DATEJUST II continues the tradition: The DATEJUST II continues the tradition of the DATEJUST, the emblematic model created by Rolex in 1945, the first self-winding waterproof wristwatch chronometer to display the date in a window on the dial. A reinterpretation of that symbol of the modern watch, the DATEJUST II inspires admiration with its impressive case and technical attributes.
hu.The OYSTER case, symbol of waterproofnes: The OYSTER case, symbol of waterproofness – The DATEJUST II’s 41 mm OYSTER case, guaranteed waterproof to a depth of 100 metres (330 feet), is a paragon of robustness. The characteristically shaped middle case is crafted from a solid block of particularly corrosion-resistant 904L steel. The fluted case back is hermetically screwed down with a special tool exclusive to Rolex watchmakers. The winding crown, fitted with the patented TWINLOCK double waterproofness system, screws down securely against the case. The crystal, with a CYCLOPS lens at 3 o’clock for easy reading of the date, is made of virtually scratchproof synthetic sapphire. The waterproof OYSTER case allies refinement with efficiency in protecting the DATEJUST II’s high-precision movement.
hu.Calibre 3136, a superlative chronometer: Calibre 3136, a superlative chronometer – The DATEJUST II is equipped with calibre 3136, a self-winding mechanical movement entirely developed and manufactured by Rolex. Like all PERPETUAL movements, the 3136 is a certified Swiss chronometer, a designation reserved for high-precision watches that have successfully passed the Swiss Official Chronometer Testing Institute (COSC) tests. Its architecture, like that of all OYSTER watch movements, makes it singularly precise and reliable. The oscillator, the true heart of the watch, has a blue PARACHROM hairspring patented and manufactured by Rolex in an exclusive alloy. Insensitive to magnetic fields, the PARACHROM hairspring offers great stability when exposed to temperature variations and remains up to 10 times more precise than a traditional hairspring in case of shocks. The oscillator is fitted between high-performance PARAFLEX shock absorbers, patented by Rolex, which offer 50 per cent greater resistance to shocks.
hu.Comfort and elegance of the OYSTER brace: Comfort and elegance of the OYSTER bracelet – This DATEJUST II model is fitted with a 904L steel OYSTER bracelet with a folding OYSTERCLASP. Developed and patented by Rolex, this elegant solid-link bracelet offers remarkable comfort and ease of use. It also features the ingenious EASYLINK rapid extension system that allows the wearer to easily increase the bracelet length by approximately 5 mm, for additional comfort in any circumstance. n
hu.The archetype of the diver’s watch, the:
The archetype of the diver’s watch, the Oyster Perpetual SUBMARINER presented at Baselworld 2012
sports a new look to complement its iconic personality. With its subtly redesigned case and its new bezel and bracelet both benefitting from recent Rolex innovations, this latest generation SUBMARINER is firmly in line
with the tradition of the historic model launched in 1953. It sets new standards in terms of robustness, legibility and reliability, strengthening its status
as a watch of action with timeless allure.
hu.The unidirectional rotatable 60-minute g: The unidirectional rotatable 60-minute graduated bezel of this new SUBMARINER is equipped with a black CERACHROM insert made of virtually scratchproof, non-fading, corrosion-resistant ceramic. The graduations are coated via a PVD process with a thin layer of platinum. The sleek black dial harbours large CHROMALIGHT hour markers and hands filled with luminescent material that emits a long-lasting blue glow. This exclusive display offers exceptional legibility in the dark.
hu.The OYSTER case, symbol of waterproofnes: The OYSTER case, symbol of waterproofness – The SUBMARINER’s 40 mm OYSTER case, guaranteed waterproof to a depth of 300 metres (1,000 feet), is a paragon of robustness. The middle case is crafted from a solid block of particularly corrosion-resistant 904L steel. The fluted case back is hermetically screwed down with a special tool exclusive to Rolex watchmakers. The winding crown, fitted with the patented TRIPLOCK triple waterproofness system, screws down securely against the case in a manner akin to a submarine’s hatch. It is protected by a crown guard that is an integral part of the middle case. The crystal is made of virtually scratchproof synthetic sapphire. The waterproof OYSTER case ensures optimal protection for the SUBMARINER’s high-precision movement.
hu.Calibre 3130, a superlative chronometer: Calibre 3130, a superlative chronometer – The new SUBMARINER is equipped with calibre 3130, a self-winding mechanical movement entirely developed and manufactured by Rolex. Like all PERPETUAL movements, the 3130 is a certified Swiss chronometer, a designation reserved for high-precision watches that have successfully passed the Swiss Official Chronometer Testing Institute (COSC) tests. Its architecture, like that of all OYSTER watch movements, makes it singularly precise and reliable. The oscillator, the true heart of the watch, has a blue PARACHROM hairspring patented and manufactured by Rolex in an exclusive alloy. Insensitive to magnetic fields, the PARACHROM hairspring offers great stability when exposed to temperature variations and remains up to 10 times more precise than a traditional hairspring in case of shocks.
hu.The OYSTERLOCK clasp, functional and sec: The OYSTERLOCK clasp, functional and secure – This SUBMARINER is fitted with a solid-link OYSTER bracelet in 904L steel. It features a new-generation OYSTERLOCK safety clasp and GLIDELOCK extension system. The ingenious patented system, located beneath the clasp cover, allows fine adjustments of the bracelet length in 2 mm increments for a total of approximately 20 mm – without using any tools. This allows the watch to be worn over a diving suit up to 3 mm thick and provides additional comfort in any circumstance.
hu.The essential sailing watch, the Oyster:
The essential sailing watch, the Oyster Perpetual YACHT-MASTER in ROLESIUM presented
at Baselworld 2012 benefits from the latest Rolex innovations in terms of the ergonomics, comfort and reliability of the bracelet, clasp and bezel.
This extensive update enriches the well-established personality of this sleek, sporty and distinguished model born in 1992. The YACHT-MASTER is a symbol of the privileged links Rolex enjoys with the world of sailing.
hu.The bidirectional rotation system on the: The bidirectional rotation system on the bezel of this new YACHT-MASTER has been entirely rethought. It is based on a 120-position notched ring and a trigonal spring providing a constant torque in both directions, ensuring minimal wear and highly precise manipulation. The bezel with raised graduations contributes greatly to the unique identity of the model and its functions. Made entirely of 950 platinum, with polished graduations standing out against a sand-blasted finish, it can be easily set to time a period of up to 60 minutes – for example the sailing time between two buoys – or to provide a reminder of elapsed time. The dial harbours large CHROMALIGHT hour markers and hands filled with luminescent material that emits a long-lasting blue glow, offering exceptional legibility in the dark.
hu.The OYSTER case, symbol of waterproofnes: The OYSTER case, symbol of waterproofness – The YACHT-MASTER’s 40 mm OYSTER case, guaranteed waterproof to a depth of 100 metres (330 feet), is a paragon of robustness. The characteristically shaped middle case is crafted from a solid block of particularly corrosion-resistant 904L steel. The fluted case back is hermetically screwed down with a special tool exclusive to Rolex watchmakers. The winding crown, fitted with the patented TRIPLOCK triple waterproofness system, screws down securely against the case. It is protected by a crown guard that is an integral part of the middle case. The crystal, with a CYCLOPS lens at 3 o’clock for easy reading of the date, is made of virtually scratchproof synthetic sapphire. The waterproof OYSTER case ensures optimal protection for the YACHT-MASTER’s high-precision movement.
hu.Calibre 3135, a superlative chronometer: Calibre 3135, a superlative chronometer – The YACHT-MASTER is equipped with calibre 3135, a self-winding mechanical movement entirely designed and manufactured by Rolex. Like all Perpetual movements, the 3135 is a certified Swiss chronometer, a designation reserved for high-precision watches that have successfully passed the Swiss Official Chronometer Testing Institute (COSC) tests. Its architecture, like that of all OYSTER watch movements makes it singularly precise and reliable. The oscillator, the true heart of the watch, has a blue Parachrom hairspring patented and manufactured by Rolex in an exclusive alloy. Insensitive to magnetic fields, the Parachrom hairspring offers great stability when exposed to temperature variations and remains up to 10 times more precise than a traditional hairspring in case of shocks.
hu.Solid-link bracelet and safety clasp - T: Solid-link bracelet and safety clasp - The new YACHT-MASTER is fitted with a solid-link OYSTER bracelet in 904L steel with a new-generation OYSTER­LOCK safety clasp, both simple to manipulate and including a security system to prevent accidental opening. Developed and patented by Rolex, this elegant solid-link bracelet offers remarkable comfort and ease of use. It also features the ingenious EASYLINK rapid extension system that allows the wearer to easily increase the bracelet length by approximately 5 mm, for additional comfort in any circumstance.
hu.Rolex is pleased to present at BASELWORL: Rolex is pleased to present at BASELWORLD 2013 the new watches in its OYSTER collection, which are on display at its new 1,230 square-metre stand, one of the largest stands at the World Watch and Jewellery Show. A blend of technological innovation and sop

Rolex is pleased to present at BASELWORLD 2013 the new watches in its OYSTER collection, which are on display at its new 1,230 square-metre stand, one of the largest stands at the World Watch and Jewellery Show. A blend of technological innovation and sophisticated aesthetics, these new Rolex models, all COSC-certified chronometers for their precision, are the latest versions of legendary watches evolving in a constant quest for perfection.
hu.Exactly 50 years ago, in 1963, Rolex unv: Exactly 50 years ago, in 1963, Rolex unveiled the Oyster Perpetual COSMOGRAPH DAYTONA, a chronograph designed for racing drivers and measuring speed. This watch has established an impressive track record on the racing circuits and achieved iconic status as the world’s most famous and most sought-after chronograph. In 2013, as Rolex deepens its commitment to motor racing by becoming Global Partner and Official Timepiece of Formula 1, the COSMOGRAPH DAYTONA is being offered for the first time in 950 platinum, the noblest and most precious of metals. This new model has an ice blue dial and a chestnut brown monobloc CERACHROM bezel in ceramic, which enhances the famous tachymetric scale for calculating speed.
hu.The CERACHROM bezel insert, a ceramic co: The CERACHROM bezel insert, a ceramic component developed and patented by Rolex in 2005, also takes pride of place in an innovative, ground-breaking form on the Oyster Perpetual GMT-MASTER II in 904L steel. Rolex has developed a single-piece CERACHROM bezel insert in two colours. The new GMT-MASTER II’s 24-hour bezel insert is half blue and half black, representing daytime hours and night-time hours. It echoes the traditional two-colour bezel of the original GMT-MASTER, which was created in 1955 to allow airline pilots to read the time in two different time zones simultaneously.
hu.Rolex is presenting a third new model in: Rolex is presenting a third new model in its Professional range this year – a timekeeping instrument dedicated to yachting regattas. The Oyster Perpetual YACHT-MASTER II is available for the first time entirely in 904L steel. This revolutionary regatta chronograph, introduced in 2007 in 18 ct gold, features a unique function: a programmable countdown with a mechanical memory that responds ideally to skippers’ needs for precise timing. The rotatable RING COMMAND bezel, an unprecedented and patented interface for setting the watch, enables simple access to the sophisticated watch functions. A pure example of Rolex expertise in terms of precision, functions and reliability, the new YACHT-MASTER II in 904L steel is the benchmark for all those with a passion for sailing.
hu.Adding to its line of prestigious classi: Adding to its line of prestigious classic watches, Rolex is offering new colourful versions of the Oyster Perpetual DAY-DATE with luxurious leather straps whose elegant colours match the dials. Available in a choice of 18 ct yellow, white or EVEROSE gold, these new DAY-DATE models with fluted bezels bring a fresh touch to Rolex’s most prestigious calendar model, created in 1956.
hu.A bezel set with baguette-cut diamonds a: A bezel set with baguette-cut diamonds appears as a feature of all seven models in a new DAY-DATE \"SERTIE\" selection in 18 ct yellow, white or EVEROSE gold graced with exclusive, sophisticated dials: mother-of-pearl creations with a floral motif decorated with gold and diamonds or an oxford motif share the limelight with fascinating gemstone dials – lapis lazuli, bull’s eye and ferrite.
hu.Rolex is also introducing new jewelled c: Rolex is also introducing new jewelled creations that bring together precious materials and magnificent gem setting. The new Oyster Perpetual LADY-DATEJUST PEARLMASTER combines a case and bracelet in 18 ct EVEROSE gold with a bezel and bracelet links in 18 ct white gold exquisitely set with diamonds of the finest quality. The dial of this sumptuous watchmaking gem is adorned with black or white mother-of-pearl enhanced with a lotus flower motif in a pink-gold tone.
hu.Benefiting from the rich heritage and ex: Benefiting from the rich heritage and exceptional know-how of Rolex, the new OYSTER collection models presented at BASELWORLD 2013 exemplify the expertise of an integrated and independent watchmaker that draws on uncompromising values and unequalled means to tirelessly perpetuate its passion for perfection.
hu.Leading brand of the Swiss watch industr:
Leading brand of the Swiss watch industry, Rolex, headquartered in Geneva, enjoys an 
unrivalled reputation for quality and expertise the world over. Its OYSTER watches, all certified as chronometers for their precision, are symbols of excellence, performance and prestige. Pioneer in the development of the wristwatch as early as 1905, the brand is at the origin of numerous major watchmaking innovations, such as the OYSTER, the first waterproof wristwatch, launched in 1926, and the PERPETUAL rotor self-winding mechanism introduced in 1931. Rolex has registered over 400 patents in the course of its history. A truly integrated and independent manufacturing company, Rolex designs, develops and produces in-house all the essential components of its watches, from the casting of the gold alloys to the machining, crafting, assembly and finishing of the movement, case, dial and bracelet. Rolex is also actively involved in supporting the arts, exploration, sports, the spirit of enterprise, and the environment through a broad palette of sponsoring activities as well as philanthropic programmes.
hu.At BASELWORLD 2013, Rolex is introducing: A 2013-as Baselworld kiállításán a Rolex bemutatja az 50 évvel ezelott, 1963-ban megjelent emblematikus modelljének, az Oyster Perpetual COSMOGRAPH DAYTONA-nak az új tekintélyes változatát.
hu.This legendary chronograph is proposed f: Ez a legendás kronográf most eloször jelenik meg a nemesfémek legelokellobbjeként számon tartott 950-es platina kivitelben. A modell gesztenyebarna monobloc CHERACROM lünettával és jégkék számlappal jelenik meg.
hu.At BASELWORLD 2013, Rolex is introducing: A 2013-as Baselworld kiállításon a Rolex bemutatja az Oyster Perpetual Yacht Master II új modelljét. A Rolex forradalmian új regatta kronográfja, amely 2007-ben jelent meg a piacon, most eloször készül 904L acélból, kék kerámia CHEROCHROM lünettával.

A 2013-as Baselworld kiállításon a Rolex bemutatja az Oyster Perpetual Yacht Master II új modelljét. A Rolex forradalmian új regatta kronográfja, amely 2007-ben jelent meg a piacon, most eloször készül 904L acélból, kék kerámia CHEROCHROM lünettával.
hu.A high-performance timekeeping instrumen: Ez egy nagyteljesítményu idoméro eszköz, kifejezetten hivatásos hajósoknak illetve a yachtok szerelmeseinek. Az új YACHT-MASTER II a Rolexnek egy egyszeru példája a pontosság, a funkcionalitás és a megbízhatóság szakértelmének tekintetében.
hu.At BASELWORLD 2013, Rolex is introducing: A 2013-as Baselworld kiállításán a Rolex bemutatja az Oyster Perpetual DAYDATE 18 kt sárga, fehér és EVEROSE arany új változatait, pazar színvilágú borszíjjal és hozzáíllo számlapokkal.
hu.A symbol of excellence and prestige, alw: A kiválóság és tekintély szimbóluma, kizárólag arany vagy platina kivitelben, az elso kronométer karóra, amely 1956-os bemutatása óta a számlapján a dátum mellett a hét napjait is megjeleníti.
hu.When Pan American World Airways made its: Amikor a Pan American World Airways elso non-stop interkontinentális New York – Moszkva járatát 1959-ben elindította, a személyzet által navigáláshoz használt karóra a Rolex Oyster Perpetual GMT-MASTER kronométer volt.
hu.The GMT-MASTER, which provided a perfect: A GMT-MASTER, amely egyszerre két idozónabeli ido tökéletes leolvasására adott lehetoséget, a polgári légiközlekedés aranykorában tekintélyesnek minosített Pan Am hivatalos órájává vált. A pilótafülkében nélkülözhetetlen eszközként tartották számon a pilóták.
hu.At BASELWORLD 2013, Rolex is introducing: A 2013-as Baselworld kiállításán a Rolex Oyster Perpetual GMT-MASTER II új 904 acélból készült verzióját mutatja be, amelynek elforgatható lünettája most eloször két színu CERACHROM kerámiából készült, a kék illetve fekete szín a napot és az éjszakát szimbolizálva.
hu.Rolex Daytona Sells for Record $1.1 Mill: Rolex Daytona Sells for Record $1.1 Million at Christie’s
hu.\nA Rolex Daytona chronograph sold for a: A Rolex Daytona chronograph sold for a record $1.1 million at a Christie's International auction in Geneva yesterday which raised $13.2 million, four times the presale estimate.
hu.\nThe 1969 stainless-steel Paul Newman-m: The 1969 stainless-steel Paul Newman-model wristwatch was sold to a buyer who wants to be anonymous, the auction house said in an e-mailed release today. The price was the highest for a Daytona at public auction. Christie's also sold a Rolex Daytona made for the Sultan of Oman for $864,285.
hu.\nThe top lot approached the $1.16 milli: The top lot approached the $1.16 million record price for any Rolex wristwatch in auction that Christie's set in May. All of the 50 lots of Rolex Daytona's sold last night. Their previous owners included celebrities such as guitarist Eric Clapton, Apollo Seven astronaut Walt Cunningham, race-car driver Bobby Unser and actor Jean-Paul Belmondo, who played the lead role in Jean-Luc Godard's \"Breathless.\"
hu.\n\\\"With 400 people in the salesroom a: \"With 400 people in the salesroom and plenty more outside, I rarely experienced a similar rock-concert atmosphere from the rostrum,\" said Aurel Bacs, head of Christie's watch department, in the statement.
hu.\nRolex began making the Daytona model i: Rolex began making the Daytona model in 1963 as its first chronograph with the tachymeter scale printed on the watch's bezel rather than the dial. Those measurements can be used to help compute speed based on how long it takes to travel a fixed distance.
hu.Canadian born tennis player with Balkan: Canadian born tennis player with Balkan origins, Miloš Raonic, visited the Rolex boutique in Belgrade during his recent visit to Serbia.
hu.\nCanadian born tennis player with Balka: Canadian born tennis player with Balkan origins, Miloš Raonic, visited the Rolex boutique in Belgrade during his recent visit to Serbia.
hu.\nOn this occasion, this talented tennis: On this occasion, this talented tennis player was able to get familiar with the showroom and state of the art sevice studio in the friendly atmosphere of Uskocka street no. 7. As the best tennis player in the history of his country, Miloš Raonic is the face of the Rolex company in Canada. The up-and-coming athlete visited Belgrade for the Davis Cup semi-final matches between Canada and Serbia.
hu.It seems like it wasn't so long ago that: It seems like it wasn't so long ago that not a single Rolex had ever sold publicly for over $1 million.
hu.\nIt seems like it wasn't so long ago th: It seems like it wasn't so long ago that not a single Rolex had ever sold publicly for over $1 million.
hu.\nNow, it seems to be happening every (C: Now, it seems to be happening every (Christie's) sale. Last month, a rare Rolex Daytona Paul Newman \"RCO\" broke the million dollar mark, and in the spring, this split-seconds 4113 also broke a million. Then, just yesterday, a very rare Rolex \"Padellone\" triple calendar moonphase sold for $1,145,00 in heavy bidding. But there are a few interesting things to note here.
hu.\nFirst, we should point out that the th: First, we should point out that the three $1,000,000 Rolex watches we mention here are all stainless steel – not a single one of them is gold or platinum – again proving that the least noble metal is actually the choice of the most serious collectors in the world. Additionally, this particular Padellone was in true top condition, proving that again condition is paramount, even in some cases surpassing rarity. And, speaking of rarity, the 8171 is not a particularly rare reference, but finding one in steel with a diamond dial such as this, in this remarkable condition, is definitely something special. This price was, of course, a record for the reference, and it is also the very first time a Rolex has broken $1,000,000 at Christie's New York – all former sales at this level were in Geneva.
hu.The Rolex Sir Edmund Hillary Wore To The: The Rolex Sir Edmund Hillary Wore To The Peak Of Mount Everest
hu.In 1953, the not-yet-Sir Edmund Hillary: In 1953, the not-yet-Sir Edmund Hillary became the first man to summit Mount Everest along with expedition partner Tenzing Norgay. And he did so with a Rolex on his wrist, an Oyster Perpetual that would prove to be the ancestor of the Explorer. While br
hu.\nIn 1953, the not-yet-Sir Edmund Hillar: In 1953, the not-yet-Sir Edmund Hillary became the first man to summit Mount Everest along with expedition partner Tenzing Norgay. And he did so with a Rolex on his wrist, an Oyster Perpetual that would prove to be the ancestor of the Explorer. While browsing the Beyer Watch and Clock Museum in Zürich, I suddenly found myself face-to-face with this legendary watch and knew I had to share it with all of you.
hu.\nThis watch was produced in 1950 and wa: This watch was produced in 1950 and was never purchased commercially. Rolex was one of the sponsors of the 1953 Everest Expedition – only one expedition was allowed each year by the Nepalese government – and part of this sponsorship included providing Hillary with this watch. It was not a gift, but rather a watch for Hillary to wear during the expedition and then to return to Rolex for extensive testing after the descent. And that is exactly what happened.
hu.The oldest and most influential newspape: The oldest and most influential newspaper in this part of Europe, \"Politika\", devoted an artical about the Rolex company, releasing the text in the column spectrum. It is about the journalists' point of view and story on the history and innovations of S
hu.\nThe oldest and most influential newspa: The oldest and most influential newspaper in this part of Europe, \"Politika\", devoted an artical about the Rolex company, releasing the text in the column spectrum. It is about the journalists' point of view and story on the history and innovations of Swiss company Rolex.
hu.True to its passion for underwater explo: True to its passion for underwater exploration, Rolex took an active part in the historic DEEPSEA CHALLENGE expedition of film-maker and explorer James Cameron (director of Titanic, Avatar) in partnership with the National Geographic Society.
hu.On March 26th 2012, the expedition's sub: On March 26th 2012, the expedition's submersible descended 10,908 metres (35,787 feet) to reach Challenger Deep, the deepest point in the world's oceans.
hu.The DEEPSEA CHALLENGER carried an experi: The DEEPSEA CHALLENGER carried an experimental divers' watch, the ROLEX DEEPSEA CHALLENGE, on its robotic manipulator arm. The timepiece worked perfectly throughout the dive at extreme pressures, confirming Rolex's position as the leading brand in waterproofness.
hu.Rolex becomes 2013 race Title Sponsor fo: Rolex becomes 2013 race Title Sponsor for Australia
hu.\nRolex, the leading luxury watchmaking: Rolex, the leading luxury watchmaking brand and a pioneer of sports sponsorship, will become the Title Sponsor of the 2013 Formula 1 Australian Grand Prix.
hu.\nThe 'Formula 1 Rolex Australian Grand: The 'Formula 1 Rolex Australian Grand Prix' is the first race of the 2013 Formula One season and will take place in Melbourne on March 14th - 17th. This announcement follows Rolex's Global Partner agreement signed in December 2012 to be the Official Timekeeper and Official Timepiece of Formula One, and demonstrates further Rolex's commitment to motor racing and global sport.
hu.\nAt the heart of the legendary precisio: At the heart of the legendary precision of Rolex watches lies an inseparable couple: the hairspring and the balance wheel
hu.\nIn 1957, thanks to a major Rolex innov: In 1957, thanks to a major Rolex innovation in balance wheel design for adjusting the movement's rate, the brand made major headway in terms of chronometric precision, confirming its reputation as the maker of the best watches in the world. During the years, Rolex engineers perfected a revolutionary system for fine regulating of the inertia of the balance wheel – the Microstella screws – which led to a distinct improvement in the precision of the watch.
hu.\nThe company Rolex traditionally taken: The company Rolex traditionally taken of the experience of using the clock in the most challenging conditions. Designed, developed and patented by Rolex Glidelock is among the simple yet efficient and very much appreciated advantages for the wearer.
hu.\nIntroduced in 2008 and fitted on the S: Introduced in 2008 and fitted on the Submariner and Submariner Date, it enables a diver to adjust the length of the bracelet to fit over a diving suit 3 mm thick. In increments of 2 mm, it offers a total extension of up to approximately 20 mm, without the need for tools.
Meet another chapter of Rolex history. The Cyclops lens, which magnifies the date two and a half times on many Oyster models, is a Rolex invention dating back to the early 1950s.
hu.\nThis innovation makes for appreciably: This innovation makes for appreciably easier reading of the date and has become a signature feature of the brand. From the 1970s, Rolex equipped its watches with a new, virtually scratchproof, synthetic sapphire crystal. Consequently, the Cyclops lens evolved. Also in sapphire, it is now affixed to the crystal. Today, the Cyclops lens is more than ever an inseparable part of the Oyster's aesthetics. However, it continues to evolve. It now has an anti-reflective coating and is proof yet again of the brand's singular care for the wearer's comfort.
hu.On 2 July 1908, Hans Wilsdorf officially: On 2 July 1908, Hans Wilsdorf officially filed and registered \"ROLEX\" as a brand name in Switzerland – a master stroke that would shape the company's future.
hu.\nSuprisingly modern in his search for t: Suprisingly modern in his search for the name \"Rolex\" he had determined that the name had to be: short, with no more than five letters, easy to pronounce in every language, have a good ring to it, easy to remember, look good on movements and dials. In 1913 the \"ROLEX\" brand was registered internationally. Today it is registered worldwide. There was no turning back, the history had begun...
hu.\nThe screw-down winding crown and the c: The screw-down winding crown and the case with screw-down back together make up the famous Oyster. This exceptional waterproof design was patented in 1926 and gave Rolex watches their reputation.
hu.\nIt was the beginning of the Rolex succ: It was the beginning of the Rolex success story. The crown not only hermetically seals the case – it also provides access to the watch's key functions. The Twinlock system, introduced in 1953, guarantees that the screw-down winding crown is perfectly water-resistant thanks to two sealed zones. Also, The Triplock system, introduced in 1970, has a third sealed zone inside the tube of the crown. It was designed to offer increased water-resistance for the Submariner, Sea-Dweller and Rolex Deepsea divers' watches, guaranteed waterproof to depths of 300 metres, 1,220 metres and 3,900 metres.
hu.No other part of a Rolex is subject to s: No other part of a Rolex is subject to such regular manipulation as the clasp, a tactile bond between the watch and its wearer
hu.\nNo other part of a Rolex is subject to: No other part of a Rolex is subject to such regular manipulation as the clasp, a tactile bond between the watch and its wearer
hu.\nThe Oysterlock clasp reconciles the de: The Oysterlock clasp reconciles the demands made on the Professional watches, with a sublime blend of robust yet sophisticated engineering, simple handling, smooth lines and, above all, security. First introduced on the GMT-Master II in 2005, latest generation Oysterlock developed and patented by Rolex represents state-of-the-art engineering. Also, a subtle feature illustrates the meeting of minds between the designer and the engineer. The sizeable crown on the clasp was an aesthetic demand. Such crowning detail marks the alliance between form and function, technology and aesthetics that characterizes the very philosophy of Rolex, and secures a lasting bond with the wearer.
hu.\nAs a timeless symbol of luxury and qua: As a timeless symbol of luxury and quality, Rolex represents a benchmark in the world of exclusive watchmaking. Rare and precious, considered the noblest of metals, platinum is striking for its silvery whiteness and its vibrant luminosity.
hu.\nIt is among the densest and heaviest m: It is among the densest and heaviest metals in the world, and is distinguished by certain unique chemical and physical properties such as its exceptional corrosion resistance. Rolex uses 950 platinum, an alloy consisting of 950‰ platinum, generally combined with ruthenium. For instance, the practised eye immediately recognizes a Day-Date or Daytona with an ice blue dial as a platinum model...
hu.\nFew individuals can be said to have be: Few individuals can be said to have been both of their time and ahead of their time. One of them is certainly Hans Wilsdorf. The prodigious and prolific innovator left an invaluable legacy to watchmaking in general and to Rolex in particular.
hu.\nHe also made Rolex the ultimate refere: He also made Rolex the ultimate reference in fine watchmaking, by consistently upholding the immutable values that defy time. Quality, passion and excellence. That non-stop spirit of enterprise and innovation extended to every conceivable domain, from intellectual property – and the wisdom of coining, registering and protecting, as early as 1908, a resonant brand name such as Rolex – to avant-garde marketing, communication and testimonial advertising strategies. Continuously imagining the future, Hans Wilsdorf created a truly timeless brand, at once classic and contemporary.
hu.Fundamental component of every Oyster an: Fundamental component of every Oyster and Rolex signature piece par excellence, the Perpetual rotor. By capturing the energy generated by even the slightest move of the wrist, this self-winding system invented by Rolex in 1931 breathes life into the mov
hu.\nFundamental component of every Oyster: Fundamental component of every Oyster and Rolex signature piece par excellence, the Perpetual rotor. By capturing the energy generated by even the slightest move of the wrist, this self-winding system invented by Rolex in 1931 breathes life into the movement so that the heartbeat of the watch never stops.
hu.\nThe principle of the Perpetual rotor h: The principle of the Perpetual rotor has remained unchanged in the course of various evolutions and successive improvements: with the slightest wrist movement, the half-moon-shaped component – the oscillating weight – pivots freely and silently on its axle driven by the Earth's gravity. The Perpetual rotor provides three major advantages for wearers: it liberates them from worrying about manually winding their watch, the self-winding system continuously winds the mainspring, thus ensuring greater regularity and better precision and finally, the waterproofness of the case is significantly reinforced since daily unscrewing and re-screwing of the winding crown are eliminated.
hu.\nHave you ever wondered why a mechanica: Have you ever wondered why a mechanical watch goes \"tick-tock\"? The ticking is produced by the escapement, a strategic part that plays a key role in the movement's measurement of time.
hu.This mechanism is a triumph of microtech: This mechanism is a triumph of microtechnology consisting of components that must interact within tolerances of a few microns. Its complex and exacting production process calls on all of the brand's vast know-how and ingenuity. Essentially, the challenge is to produce components of the highest precision to ensure their near-seamless interaction.
hu.Therefore, another ingredient is crucial: Therefore, another ingredient is crucial: lubrication. Rolex has therefore developed an exclusive new lubricant, which has a considerably longer useful life and greater stability over time. It allows lengthened service intervals and increases the reliability and performance of the watches in the long run.
hu.\nIn 1910, in Switzerland, a Rolex becam: In 1910, in Switzerland, a Rolex became the first wristwatch to obtain official chronometer certification. And the key moments of this quest explain and justify each word of this famous aphorism, which took its definitive form around 1957.
hu.\nSimply \\\"Chronometer\\\" at first, t: Simply \"Chronometer\" at first, then \"Officially Certified Chronometer\", it finally became \"Superlative Chronometer Officially Certified\". The chronometer certificates avec mention disappeared in 1973 with the creation of the Swiss Official Chronometer Testing Institute (COSC). But the inscription formulated by Rolex remains as a reminder of the quest for excellence and the pioneering role of the brand in the field of chronometric precision.
hu.Meet unusual quartz watch from Rolex, fr: Meet unusual quartz watch from Rolex, from the eighties. Item 1407, with factory Ref. 455 marked the recent auction in Geneva, since it is one of the few remanining Rolex clocks from the limited \"Time to the Second\" collection.
hu.It is designed as the authentic decorati: It is designed as the authentic decoration of retail boutiques, a watch with classic design that combines brass and gilded details, which achieved a price of 4,000 Swiss francs.

hu.Rolex is pleased to unveil the new Celli: Rolex is pleased to unveil the new Cellini collection, a contemporary celebration of classicism and the eternal elegance of traditional timepieces. Consisting of 12 classically inspired models, this new collection combines the best of Rolex know-how and i

Rolex is pleased to unveil the new Cellini collection, a contemporary celebration of classicism and the eternal elegance of traditional timepieces. Consisting of 12 classically inspired models, this new collection combines the best of Rolex know-how and its high standards of perfection with an approach that heightens watchmaking heritage in its most timeless form.

he cases are available exclusively in 18 ct white or Everose gold cast by Rolex in its own foundry. Their round shape and classic 39 mm diameter are marks of tradition, while the refined lugs, the polished finish and the double bezel – one domed and the second delicately fluted – add a touch of distinction. The layout of the dials is determined by the watches' different functions, dividing the collection into three families. The Cellini Time models are thequintessential expression of a watchmaking classic, the guardian of hours, minutes and seconds. The Cellini Date models add a date function via a hand on a small sub-dial, blending practicality and elegance. Finally, the Cellini Dual Time models indicate the time in two time zones.
hu.Rolex presents a world first with its ne: Rolex presents a world first with its new version of the Oyster Perpetual GMT-Master II equipped with a two-colour Cerachrom bezel insert in red and blue, combining the best in  high technology with the iconic aesthetics of the original 1955 model.

Rolex presents a world first with its new version of the Oyster Perpetual GMT-Master II equipped with a two-colour Cerachrom bezel insert in red and blue, combining the best in high technology with the iconic aesthetics of the original 1955 model.
hu.A technological and aesthetic feat, the: A technological and aesthetic feat, the new red and blue Cerachrom bezel insert is obtained via a unique manufacturing process developed and patented by Rolex. The characteristically shaped middle case is crafted from a solid block of 18 ct white gold, cast by Rolex in its own foundry. The GMT-Master II is equipped with calibre 3186, a self-winding mechanical movement with a second time zone function and date display entirely developed and manufactured by Rolex.
hu.The new GMT-Master II is fitted with a s: The new GMT-Master II is fitted with a solid-link Oyster bracelet in 18 ct white gold with the ingenious Rolexpatented Easylink rapid extension system that allows the wearer to easily increase the bracelet length by approximately 5 mm.
hu.At Baselworld 2014, Rolex presented new: At Baselworld 2014, Rolex presented new versions of several timepieces, including the famous Daytona - a new jewelled version of the Oyster Perpetual Cosmograph Daytona that combines the nobility of 950 platinum and the radiance of purest-quality diamonds
hu.\nThe dial is entirely paved with diamon: The dial is entirely paved with diamonds, apart from the ice blue chronograph counters. Rolex reserves this rare and exclusive colour for platinum models. The resplendent bezel is set with 36 baguettecut diamonds.
hu.\nThe Cosmograph Daytona's 40 mm Oyster: The Cosmograph Daytona's 40 mm Oyster case, guaranteed waterproof to a depth of 100 metres (330 feet), The Cosmograph Daytona is equipped with calibre 4130, a self-winding mechanical chronograph movement with a column wheel entirely developed and manufactured by Rolex.
hu.This new Cosmograph Daytona is fitted wi: This new Cosmograph Daytona is fitted with a solid-link Oyster bracelet in 950 platinum, with an Oysterlock safety clasp that prevents accidental opening.
hu.ROLESOR - a union of gold and steel: ROLESOR - a union of gold and steel
hu.The juxtaposition of gold and steel with: The juxtaposition of gold and steel with their contrasting colours and radiance, in subtly balanced harmony: this is ROLESOR, an auspicious meeting of two metals on a single watch.
hu.The name ROLESOR was patented by Rolex i: The name ROLESOR was patented by Rolex in 1933, and has become one of the distinctive elements marking the brand's watches, a true Rolex signature. The concept is simple: the bezel, the winding crown as well as the centre bracelet links are made of 18 ct yellow or EVEROSE gold; the middle case and the outer links of the bracelet are made of 904L stainless steel superalloy. On white ROLESOR models, the bezel alone is in gold. Introduced on the Oyster Perpetual DATEJUST model in 1948, ROLESOR met with immediate success and contributed largely to the legendary status of this distinctive wristwatch. In 2011, EVEROSE ROLESOR appeared for the first time on a Professional model: the Oyster Perpetual YACHT-MASTER II.
hu.The CHROMALIGHT display uses an innovati: The CHROMALIGHT display uses an innovative luminescent material which extends the threshold for visibility in dark conditions.
hu.This substance, which emits a blue glow,: This substance, which emits a blue glow, is applied to the hands and hour markers of most Professional models in the OYSTER collection for optimal and long-lasting legibility. The luminosity duration of the CHROMALIGHT display is almost double that of a standard luminescent material and can extend beyond eight hours.
hu.The intensity of the luminosity is also: The intensity of the luminosity is also more consistent over the entire emission time. Introduced in 2008 on the ROLEX DEEPSEA divers' watch, waterproof to 3,900 metres (12,800 feet), and then on SUBMARINER DATE models, the luminescent CHROMALIGHT display features on virtually all the Professional models today.
hu.Virtually scratchproof, non-fading and h: Virtually scratchproof, non-fading and highly legible the bezel is one of the parts of a watch most exposed to shocks, scratches, corrosion and other environmental factors.
hu.With the robustness and durability of it: With the robustness and durability of its watches in mind, Rolex developed and patented the Cerachrom bezel for specific Professional models in the Oyster collection, which thus retain all of their beauty and functionality even in the most extreme conditions. Manufactured by Rolex from a particularly hard, corrosion-resistant ceramic, this exclusive component is virtually impervious to scratches, and its colour is unaffected by ultraviolet rays.
hu.First introduced in 2005 on the GMT-Mast: First introduced in 2005 on the GMT-Master II, models, the Cerachrom bezel appears today on the Yacht-Master II in the 18 ct yellow gold and the Everose Rolesor and 904L steel versions, as well as on the divers'watches: the Submariner and Submariner Date, Sea-Dweller 4000 and Rolex Deepsea. Depending on the model, the ceramic bezel insert can be black, blue or green. It also offers excellent polishability ensuring an exceptional, long-lasting lustre.
hu.\nThe dials of these exquisite 34 mm wat: Rolex is introducing new gem-set versions of the Oyster Perpetual Datejust Pearlmaster 34 in 18 ct yellow, white and Everose gold
hu.Also, the new Oyster Perpetual Datejust: The dials of these exquisite 34 mm watchmaking masterpieces are entirely paved with diamonds. The nobility of the time display is enhanced by the bezel adorned with baguette-cut pink sapphires on the 18 ct yellow gold version, or with baguettecut blue sapphires on the 18 ct white gold version. The version in 18 ct Everose gold is distinguished by a splendid bezel with brilliant-cut diamonds set in 18 ct white gold.
hu.Rolex is presenting a new version of the: Rolex is presenting a new version of the Oyster Perpetual Milgauss with unique and symbolic aesthetics.
hu.\nIts green sapphire crystal marked a fi: Its green sapphire crystal marked a first in watchmaking when it was introduced on the Milgauss in 2007. Now this crystal is combined with an electric blue dial, an allusion to the emblematic lightning-boltshaped seconds hand and the watch's technical purpose as a paramagnetic timepiece designed for engineers and scientists in the 1950s. Seen through the green sapphire crystal, the Z blue dial takes on a powerfully attractive magnetic hue. The Milgauss is equipped with calibre 3131, a self-winding mechanical movement entirely developed and manufactured by Rolex.
hu.The 40 mm Oyster case of the Milgauss,: The 40 mm Oyster case of the Milgauss, guaranteed waterproof to a depth of 100 metres (330 feet), is a paragon of robustness and reliability.
hu.Rolex is introducing updated versions of: Rolex is introducing updated versions of its quintessential Oyster Perpetual model in 31 and 36 mm featuring exclusive new dials.
hu.\nRolex is introducing updated versions: Rolex is introducing updated versions of its quintessential Oyster Perpetual model in 31 and 36 mm featuring exclusive new dials. The Oyster Perpetual – the purest expression of the Oyster concept and having no other function than a clear, accurate time display – comprises the renowned Rolex waterproof Oyster case and the self-winding Rolex Perpetual movement famed for its precision and reliability. The oscillator, the true heart of the watch, has a blue Parachrom hairspring patented and manufactured by Rolex.
hu.Insensitive to magnetic fields, the Para: Insensitive to magnetic fields, the Parachrom hairspring offers great stability when exposed to temperature variations and remains up to 10 times more precise in case of shocks than a traditional hairspring. The Oyster Perpetual watches are paired with a solid-link Oyster bracelet in 904L steel which is very secure and comfortable to wear. The 36 mm Oyster Perpetual is equipped with COSC calibre 3130, a self-winding mechanical movement, and the smaller version is equipped with COSC calibre 2231.
hu.A true icon for divers and marine engine: Egy igazi ikon búvároknak és tengerész mérnököknek. A Rolex Sea-Dweller megújjulva tért vissza és a Rolex legkorszerubb technikai fejlesztéseivel büszkélkedhet.
hu.\nA true icon for divers and marine engi: Egy igazi ikon búvároknak és tengerész mérnököknek. A karakteres formájú tok egy különösen korrózióálló 904L acélból készült.
hu.The Sea-Dweller 4000's 60-minute graduat: A Sea-Dweller 4000 60 perces jelölésu, egyirányba forgatható lünettája lehetové teszi a precíz és biztonságos merülés és nyomás csökkenésének a mérését. Továbbá az új Sea-Dweller 4000 a 3135-ös kaliberrel van felszerelve, ami egy automata felhúzású mechanikus szerkezet, dátum jelzéssel és Oyster csattal, valamint Oysterlock biztonsági zárral van ellátva, ami megakadályozza a véletlenszeru kinyílásokat a Fliplock kiterjesztésnek köszönhetoen.
hu.Among the new Rolex watches at Baselworl: Among the new Rolex watches at Baselworld 2014 are 3 new versions of the Rolex Sky-Dweller. Among the new Rolex watches at Baselworld 2014 are 3 new versions of the Rolex Sky-Dweller. Rolex is now presenting three new versions of the Oyster Perpetual Sky-Dweller, its most recent and most innovative model boasting 14 patents, which was launched in 2012.
hu.The new versions in 18 ct yellow, white: The new versions in 18 ct yellow, white and Everose gold in a 42 mm case expand the existing collection by introducing new exclusive dials combined with new combinations of bracelets and leather straps.This model with a strong Rolex identity combines a dual time zone display, as intuitive to read as it is simple to use, with a particularly reliable and innovative annual calendar.
hu.The Sky-Dweller is equipped with calibre: The Sky-Dweller is equipped with calibre 9001, a self-winding mechanical movement. The new versions of the Sky-Dweller in 18 ct yellow or white gold are paired respectively with brown or black alligator leather straps and with an 18 ct yellow or white gold Oysterclasp. The18 ct Everose gold version is fitted on an 18 ct Everose gold solid link Oyster bracelet with an Oysterclasp.
hu.In depth introduction of the Rolex Celli: In depth introduction of the Rolex Cellini collection begins with Time model, which is the essence of classic elegance. In terms of aesthetics, the magic of the moment on  dial was promoted to timeless manner, moderate and unobtrusive.
hu.\nRolex famous character and exclusive i: Rolex famous character and exclusive innovations are subtly pointed out by a number of selected details, such as the Roman numerals and discrete label for a minute. Keeping with tradition, comfort and durability are guaranteed by the impressive development and selection of the highest quality materials. The new Cellini collection celebrates the most fascinating and exalting facets of watchmaking tradition. Here, elegance and nobility are absolute.
hu.\nThe cases are available exclusively in: The cases are available exclusively in 18 ct white or Everose gold cast by Rolex in its own foundry. Hours, minutes and seconds form the essence of everyday timekeeping. The Cellini Time captures the present as if nothing  else was of importance; nothing but the magic of the moment.
hu.\nThe Cellini Time model is offered in f: The Cellini Time model is offered in four versions: with a black or white lacquered dial, and with a 39 mm case in a choice of 18 ct white or Everose gold. It is fitted on a remborded and stitched alligator leather strap with large scales, in shiny black or brown depending on the model, with an 18 ct gold buckle matching the gold of the case.
hu.The most complex model from the Cellini: The most complex model from the Cellini collection is the Dual Time watch. Suitable for passengers from all over the world, the Dual Time Rolex besides the display of hours, minutes and seconds function is also equipped for simultaneous measurement of tim

The most complex model from the Cellini collection is the Dual Time watch. Suitable for passengers from all over the world, the Dual Time Rolex besides the display of hours, minutes and seconds function is also equipped for simultaneous measurement of time in two time zones.
hu.The Cellini Dual Time model grants its w: The Cellini Dual Time model grants its wearers the gift of temporal ubiquity. With a quick glance at the dial, they are simultaneously aware of the time here and the time elsewhere. The small gold-rimmed sub-dial at 6 o'clock shows the minutes and hours in a faraway part of the world: the land of your loved ones when you are travelling or the location of business associates on other continents.
hu.\nThe Cellini Dual Time model is offered: The Cellini Dual Time model is offered in four versions: with a black or silver dial featuring a \"rayon flammé de la gloire\" guilloche motif, and with a 39 mm case in a choice of 18 ct white or Everose gold. It is mounted on an alligator leather strap with large scales, remborded and stitched, in shiny black or brown depending on the model, and fitted with an 18 ct gold buckle matching the gold of the case.
hu.\nLike other versions from the collectio: Like other versions from the collection, Cellini Time and Date, Dual Time uses excellent self-winding mechanism with COSC certificate of impressive precision that works at a frequency of 4 Hz (28,800 vibrations per hour). Rolex Cellini Dual Time is waterproof to a depth of 50 metres.
hu.The refined aesthetics and heritage of t: The refined aesthetics and heritage of the Renaissance artist Benvenuto Cellini inspired the Rolex company to create a harmoniously designed timepiece of timeless values.
hu.Thanks to the world's first-class watchm: Thanks to the world's first-class watchmaking, this influential period in the history of art was given it's modern edition and thus uniquely promoted with the Rolex Cellini Date. The Cellini Date model adds another function to the indication of hours, minutes and seconds: a date display imbued with elegance, tradition and poetry. Located at 3 o'clock, a small gold-rimmed sub-dial with a guilloche motif at its centre shows the full sequence of the dates of the month.
hu.Day after day, a small gold hand indicat: Day after day, a small gold hand indicates the current date, as on timepieces of yesteryear. A splendid instrument to project yourself in time, this calendar displays on a single dial, the days gone by and days to come: yesterday, today and tomorrow.
hu.The Cellini Date model is offered in fou: The Cellini Date model is offered in four versions: with a black or silver dial featuring a \"rayon flammé de la gloire\" guilloche motif, and with a 39 mm case in a choice of 18 ct white or Everose gold. It is fitted on a remborded and stitched alligator leather strap with large scales, in shiny black or brown depending on the model, and with an 18 ct gold buckle matching the gold of the case.
hu.Rolex, the leading luxury watchmaking br: Rolex, the leading luxury watchmaking brand, has revealed the two bespoken instruments it exclusively developed and manufactured for BLOODHOUND SSC, the supersonic car.
hu.True to its philosophy, Rolex has combin: True to its philosophy, Rolex has combined world class technology with exacting standards of precision and reliability to create these highly accurate instruments that will be installed in the cockpit of BLOODHOUND SSC, as it aims to set a new World Land Speed Record of 1,000 miles per hour (1609.34 km/h) in South Africa in 2015/2016 and inspire the next generation of scientists and engineers. These two vital instruments, with characteristic Rolex analogue dials, will sit either on the left and right of the dashboard.
hu.Building on Rolex's legendary reliabilit: Building on Rolex's legendary reliability, these highly accurate instruments will provide a necessary visual reference and fail-safe back-up for some of the on-screen readouts during the two critical phases in the record bid: assisting precision braking from 1,000 mph on the 20 kilometre track and for timekeeping during the turnaround in-between the two mandatory record runs.
hu.In 1914, the Kew Observatory near London: In 1914, the Kew Observatory near London granted a \"Class A\" certificate to a wristwatch for the very first time. This major achievement by a small Rolex watch astonished the world and marked the advent of the modern precision wristwatch.
hu.Until then, such a certification, which: Until then, such a certification, which attested to the highest chronometric precision, had generally been awarded only to large marine chronometers. This first chronometer wristwatch met observatory's demanding criteria: 45 days of tests, in five different positions and at three different temperatures. The brand perfected the concept of the modern  watch in 1926 by inventing a waterproof Oyster case and then, in 1931, by developing the self-winding Perpetual rotor movement.
hu.According to Rolex, the Syloxi hairsprin: According to Rolex, the Syloxi hairspring is the new, optimal silicon hairspring.
hu.Carrying five patents, introduced on cal: Carrying five patents, introduced on calibre 2236, a silicon and silicon oxide composite (hence the name Syloxi) , whose thermo-compensating and non-magnetic properties allow the Syloxi hairspring to maintain its high precision when subjected to temperature fluctuations and magnetic ride.
hu.A new feminine interpretation of Rolex's: A new feminine interpretation of Rolex's emblematic watch presents timeless elegance of gem for daily wear. Enhanced by dial of subtle and shimmering colour and noble ROLESOR gold with sparkling diamonds, Lady-Datejust Pearlmaster is perfect choice.
hu.Set with diamonds, it enchants the moder: Set with diamonds, it enchants the modern woman with its luxurious refinement and traditional technical features - COCS calibre 2235, exquisite waterproofness (100 meters) and approximately 48 hours of power reserve.
hu.After great anticipation of enthusiasts: After great anticipation of enthusiasts all around the world, Rolex has recently returned to offer original colours, first introduced in year 1955.
hu.Meet the modern classic, watch that comb: Meet the modern classic, watch that combines the attractive red and blue corona finish with white gold case and bracelet – contemporary GMT-Master II.
hu.At the recent event \\\"Auctionata\\\" p: At the recent event \"Auctionata\" presented an extremely rare Rolex watch that has attracted a lot of attention among world collectors.
hu.Attention was even greater because it is: Attention was even greater because it is a clock that belonged to the legendary rock musician Eric Clapton, reference marks 6034. A beautiful watch from the 50s displays case and bracelet entirely made of pink gold.
hu.The new owner paid a price of 50,000 eur: The new owner paid a price of 50,000 euros, and besides the almost perfect visual condition, this anonymous collector also gained a bespoke caliber R 72 with 17 rubies and chronograph function.
hu.Rolex uses only the finest stones to ado: Rolex uses only the finest stones to adorn its watches: diamonds, rubies, sapphires and emeralds. The selection criteria for these gems is exceptionally demanding.
hu.The precious stones are then entrusted t: The precious stones are then entrusted to the gem-setters, masters of their art and skilled in the various techniques of their profession - the precise alignment of the height of the gems, their orientation and position, the robustness, regularity and aesthetics. Everything works together to enhance the stones and the watch itself.
hu.On the very first day of the ceremonial: On the very first day of the ceremonial start at the famous Wimbledon tennis tournament, we remember the unforgettable victory tandem - the campaign for Rolex Lady-Datejust with the American champion Chris Evert-Lloyd.
